description: See Description Below Plain weave. Handwoven. Dark grey, tan & red weft. woven in bands of rust, gold, peach, royal blue and purple weft. Both selvedges.Stapled to 8.5 x 11" card with 99.1.1129.89. "Fashion Fabrics E74" written on card (grey, tan, red, purple, gold, peach)
